projects.title: PhishNet
projects.bodyText: A messaging mobile application that filters out scam/spam messages. Made for Android.

projects.title: Galactic Salvage
projects.bodyText:
- A (really early) RTS Tower Defense game based in procedurally generated worlds across the cosmos.
 - Harvest Resources, Build bases and drones to fight off enemy world colonisers.
 - Built in Unity, with procedural generation created with perlin noise.

projects.title: CrimeScape
projects.bodyText:
- A crime data visualizer and AI forecaster made for ConUHacks 8!
- Displays crime heatmap of Montreal with real data provided by the city.
- CrimeScape is an a Award Winning Project at ConUHacks 8 - Award: Best Usage of MongoDB

projects.title: Arena of Champions
projects.bodyText:
- An Upcoming Arena Fighting Game!
- Battle an AI until you can't
- Upgrade your Champion using XP gained from enemies

projects.title: Invoice Tracking App
projects.bodyText:
- Invoice Tracking App made in Android Studio using **Java**
- Used **Room** Databases to store user inputted data
- Designed a simple, interactive and accurate UI

projects.title: Car Parts Tracker
projects.bodyText:
- A Car Part Tracker/Manager web app made using **Node, Handlebars and PostGresSQL Database** 
- People can create a new car part and create projects
 - Implemented User loging and regisitration
 - Temporarily Deployed on **heroku** (changing soon)

projects.title: Budgeting App
projects.bodyText:
- A Desktop app that helps users manage and budget their income
 - Built in **WPF** and coded in **C#**
 - Stores expenses in a database field stored locally 
 - Users can use a Grid view or a Pie Chart view to visualize their budget

projects.title: Inventory Tracker App
projects.bodyText:
- A Desktop App created in **WPF** for grocery stores to keep track of products 
 - Save and Load inventory items locally to a .CSV file
 - Very basic user interface

projects.title: Basic Web Scraper
projects.bodyText:
- A Basic Web Scraper developed in **Python**
 - Users enter the HTML tag of the element they wish to scrape 
 - Values are consistently updated

projects.title: Pixel Clicker
projects.bodyText:
- A script developed in **Python** that automatically clicks a pixel based on the pixel's colour
 - Useful when clicking a particular pixel on the screen consistently
